text: Robert Smith was the last public hanging in Scotland and the second-to-last public hanging in the United Kingdom, only succeeded by Michael Barrett. He was convicted of the murder of a girl. He was hanged May 12, 1868. ==Related pages== *Michael Barrett, the last public hanging in the United Kingdom *Frances Kidder, the last woman publicly hanged in the United Kingdom Category:1868 deaths Category:People executed by hanging
title: Robert Smith (murderer)
